citations.narrative:
On 17 October 2022, beagle #22C0440 was found dead and beagle #22C0435 was found with injuries. The beagles were
each housed in compatible groups of 4 in primary enclosures that were next to each other. The two kennels were
separated with a kennel divider that had been secured with a chain due to a broken latch. The kennel divider secured with
the chain allowed enough give to create enough space for beagle #22C0440 and beagle #22C0435 to come in contact to
fight, resulting in injuries to each dog. In addition, beagle #22C0440 become caught in the space under the kennel divider
resulting in death. Securing the kennel divider with a chain did not maintain the primary enclosures in good repair to
prevent injuries, resulting in the death of one dog and injuries to another. Ensure that all primary enclosures are kept in
good repair to prevent injuries to animals. Corrected prior to inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ii)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
On 17 October 2022, beagle #22C0440 was found dead and beagle #22C0435 was found with injuries. The beagles were 
each housed in compatible groups of 4 in primary enclosures that were next to each other. The two kennels were 
separated with a kennel divider that had been secured with a chain due to a broken latch. The kennel divider secured with 
the chain allowed enough give to create enough space for beagle #22C0440 and beagle #22C0435 to come in contact to 
fight, resulting in injuries to each dog. In addition, beagle #22C0440 become caught in the space under the kennel divider 
resulting in death. Securing the kennel divider with a chain did not maintain the primary enclosures in good repair to 
prevent injuries, resulting in the death of one dog and injuries to another. Ensure that all primary enclosures are kept in 
good repair to prevent injuries to animals. Corrected prior to inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives. 
 
End of report.
